public class Date

Simple Date Class - no error checking.

public Date()
Parameterless constructor with date set to the default 1/1/2000

Date

public Date(int d,
            int m,
            int y)
Constructor for creating a specific date.

Parameters:
d - the day part of the date (1 - 31, depending on the month).
m - the month part of the date (1 - 12).
y - the year part of the date.

d - the day part of the date (1 - 31, depending on the month).

y - the year part of the date.
